comments.author: stephen.donner@gmail.com
comments.text:
https://donate.mozilla.org/page/contribute/firefoxtshirt doesn't validate:

http://html5.validator.nu/?doc=https%3A%2F%2Fdonate.mozilla.org%2Fpage%2Fcontribute%2Ffirefoxtshirt

See also bug 640219; not sure if we'll be able to fix this or not.
